overall.description: View inputs as arrays with at least two dimensions.

arys1, arys2, \u2026.description: One or more array-like sequences.  Non-array inputs are converted to arrays.  Arrays that already have two or more dimensions are preserved.

res, res2, \u2026.description: An array, or list of arrays, each with a.ndim >= 2. Copies are avoided where possible, and views with two or more dimensions are returned.
